attributes.action: ban the use of 4-ring plastic holders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
4-ring plastic holders used for keeping 4 tins together (usually beer or lager) are dangerous as they maim, injure, trap and kill wildlife.
When this product is discarded whether responsibly or not it is found to cause unnecessary suffering to animals.
On land this product acts like a tornaque around animals limbs. In the sea it kills dolphins and fish.
Cardboard is a suitable alternative and can be re-cycled and is inexpensive.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban the use of 4-ring plastic holders."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15316.asp

Prime Minister's Office
